text.style: font-size: 22px; margin: 10px 0; color: #f5f5f5; font-family: 'Roboto Condensed', sans-serif;
margin: 5px 0; font-size: 14px; display: flex; align-items: center; color: #f5f5f5; font-family: 'Roboto Condensed', sans-serif;
text.tspan: Online: ${days} days, ${hours} h, and ${minutes} min ago

g.style: width: 50%; padding: 20px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center;

text.style: margin: 10px 0; font-size: 18px; color: #f5f5f5; font-family: 'Roboto Condensed', sans-serif;
margin: 10px 0; font-size: 18px; color: #f5f5f5; font-family: 'Roboto Condensed', sans-serif;
margin: 10px 0; font-size: 18px; color: #f5f5f5; font-family: 'Roboto Condensed', sans-serif;
margin: 10px 0; font-size: 18px; color: #f5f5f5; font-family: 'Roboto Condensed', sans-serif;
